subject: Re: [junit] Errors in asserting multiple submit buttons in single page.
msgSnippet: ... Please search the web with keywords JUnit multiple assertion failures . You ll get all the answers you want. Short answer: JUnit s designed to show only
messageBody:
amit wrote:

> Is it so that only one submit button in a page can be asserted in
> single test?

Please search the web with keywords "JUnit multiple assertion failures".
You'll get all the answers you want.

Short answer: JUnit's designed to show only one assertion failure per
test; if you want multiple assertions to fail, put them in separate tests.
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com
Author, JUnit Recipes: Practical Methods for Programmer Testing
